Variable.Name: AntiBump
Variable.Comment: If Enable anti-bump is on in the other case anti-bump is off

Variable.Name: CoolHeatMode
Variable.Comment: TRUE: Heating MODE, FALSE: - Cooling MODE

Variable.Name: ENABLE
Variable.Comment: TRUE: Enable FB, FALSE: Disable FB

Variable.Name: Q
Variable.Comment: FALSE: If INPUT does not change. TRUE: If INPUT changes

Variable.Name: INPUTp
Variable.Comment: Value that the INPUT variable had on the previous cycle

Variable.Name: DeadBand
Variable.Comment: Semi-amplitude dead band (0.0 = NO dead band)

Variable.Name: Q
Variable.Comment: TRUE when input is in DeadBand

Variable.Name: DirRevMode
Variable.Comment: TRUE: Reverse MODE, FALSE: Direct MODE

Variable.Name: ENABLE
Variable.Comment: TRUE: Enable FB, FALSE: Disable FB

Variable.Name: Q
Variable.Comment: FALSE: If INPUT does not change. TRUE: If INPUT changes

Variable.Name: INPUTp
Variable.Comment: Value that the INPUT variable had on the previous cycle

Variable.Name: EN_ExpFilt
Variable.Comment: TRUE: AntiBump On, FALSE: AntiBump Off

Variable.Name: ExpFilter
Variable.Comment: Ver.: 1.2.0 - Manages a first degree low-pass filter

Variable.Name: Step
Variable.Comment: Variable step to add to the output to reach the input

Variable.Name: Q
Variable.Comment: TRUE when CLK changes from TRUE to FALSE. FALSE if all other cases

Variable.Name: FirstCycleDone
Variable.Comment: True when first cycle is done

Variable.Name: GapOut
Variable.Comment: Gap between old output (cycle before) and the new output (current cycle)

Variable.Name: Iterm_p
Variable.Comment: Integral term at previous program cycle

Variable.Name: ItermPIDDb
Variable.Comment: Iterm to set when pid is in DeadBand

Variable.Name: ItermPIDMan
Variable.Comment: Iterm to set when ManMode was disabled

Variable.Name: ItermSet
Variable.Comment: Set Integral term to a specified value

Variable.Name: ItermVal
Variable.Comment: Integral term value to be set

Variable.Name: Kp_1
Variable.Comment: Temporary variable for the management of the proportional term

Variable.Name: Sig_OUT
Variable.Comment: Limited output signal between low an upper limits

Variable.Name: Limit_ON
Variable.Comment: LIMITER status: 1 - LIMITER ON, 0 - LIMITER OFF

Variable.Name: LimitedMODE
Variable.Comment: TURE: Limited PID output, FALSE: Unlimited PID output

Variable.Name: Limiter_ON
Variable.Comment: TRUE: Limiter working, FALSE: Limiter off

Variable.Name: ManMode
Variable.Comment: FALSE: Automatic internal PID controller, TRUE: Manual internal PID output override

Variable.Name: t1
Variable.Comment: Time for previous input sample X1

Variable.Name: t2
Variable.Comment: Time for previous input sample X2

Variable.Name: t3
Variable.Comment: Time for previous input sample X3

Variable.Name: t4
Variable.Comment: Time for previous input sample X4

Variable.Name: t_1
Variable.Comment: Tempo relativo a X1 riscalato su t4

Variable.Name: t_2
Variable.Comment: Tempo relativo a X2 riscalato su t4

Variable.Name: t_3
Variable.Comment: Tempo relativo a X3 riscalato su t4

Variable.Name: t_4
Variable.Comment: Tempo relativo a X4 riscalato su t4

Variable.Name: Check
Variable.Comment: Check if all Derivative variable are valued

Variable.Name: Kp_1
Variable.Comment: Variabile 'temporanea' per la gestione del termine proporzionale.

Variable.Name: TRIG
Variable.Comment: Trigger for CoolHeatMode and/or DirRevMode changes

Variable.Name: XOUT_HeatMODE
Variable.Comment: Heating MODE Function Block main output

Variable.Name: XOUT_RevsMODE
Variable.Comment: Reverse MODE Function Block main output
